titleStmt.title: A proclamation for the marchauntes aduenturers [...] Elizabeth dei gratia Angliæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ, Regina fidei defensor, &c. [...]
Proclamations. 1559-05-01
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation for carrying small sums of money out of the realm.
Another edition of STC 7894 (Steele, R. Tudor and Stuart Proclamations, 507).
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
At foot of page Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
